Compatible Android Emulators
Monster Rancher Metropolis: My Monster Rancher Archive (Andriod): FAQ: The Most Important Game Info: Compatible Android Emulators
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, December 15, 2012 - 10:52 am:

These are emulators which members have had some success with.
Please note that they may not work 100%.


If you are using one not listed here, you can contribute by posting in Miscellaneous Q&A. Please give details of any quirks you have discovered in running the game.

Name Notes
Blue StacksSearching for 'My Monster Rancher' on it might not show up, but 'My Monster' does have it on the list as maybe the second entry. NOT STABLE, NOT CONSISTENT
